oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ratliff-Rush filtration, regularity and depth of higher associated graded modules: Part I
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PUTHENPURAKAL, TJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hilbert coefficients
local cohomology
normal ideals
rings
algebras
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we introduce a new technique to study associated graded modules. Let (A, m) be a Noetherian local ring with depth A >= 2. Our techniques give a necessary and sufficient condition for depth G(m)n (A) >= 2 for all n >> 0. Other applications are also included; most notable is an upper bound regarding the Ratliff-Rush filtration. (c) 2005
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF PURE AND APPLIED ALGEBRA, 208(1), 159-176
